Values.1: Central "arena" area—all routes lead back to it
Values.2: Perfectly symmetrical—any position is a good one
Values.3: Safe areas and open spaces—move between cover
Values.4: Small, interconnected areas—take control of them
Values.5: Tight and labyrinth-like—tricky corners and doors
Values.6: Very uneven elevation—high ground is everything

Values.11: A grave has been dug but nobody's inside
Values.12: A modest grave marked by flowers and toys
Values.13: A single, shuffling zombie soldier, unresponsive
Values.14: A skeleton in camo clutching a whiskey bottle
Values.15: A spattering of blood and spare ammo
Values.16: A tilted flag marks the spot of a loss
Values.21: A warrior fallen upon a bayonet or sword
Values.22: A wooden cross with scratched-out dog tags
Values.23: Body in a foxhole wielding an impressive weapon
Values.24: Boots with feet still in them, bucket of grenades
Values.25: Bruised corpse with a severely broken neck
Values.26: Case of untreated venom spread, unpleasant
Values.33: Decaying body, gold coins spilling from pockets
Values.34: Disorganized bones aside a dusty old novel
Values.35: Gaunt corpse clutching a stash of stimulants
Values.36: Gravestone that wishes good health and luck
Values.41: Grinning natural mummy with a gut wound
Values.42: Grisly suicide, shotgun trigger pulled with toe
Values.43: Hanged soldiers swaying in the breeze
Values.44: Head on a pike with a dreadful expression
Values.46: Nine simply marked graves in a perfect square
Values.51: Peaceful natural mummy curled up with a pipe
Values.52: People in uniform stacked beneath a bloody tarp
Values.54: Rotting skeleton hunched over an unsent letter
Values.55: Scattered tongues, fingers, and eyes, radioactive
Values.56: Several poor souls strung up on meat hooks
Values.61: Shocked soldier with a clean hole in the forehead
Values.62: Smoking pile of ash haunted by a ghost
Values.63: Something has absolutely dissected a human

Values.65: Unmitigated devastation, bodies litter the area
